title: Quicken 2015 2.3.1 – Complete personal finance solution
content: Quicken 2015 helps you manage all your personal finances in one place, so you can see where you’re spending and where you can save. Quicken automatically categorizes your financial transactions, helps you stay on top of bills and set goals so you can save more. You can even access your data on the go.   […]

title: Disk App 1.2.2 – Clean & Create Free Space on your Drive
content: OS X Yosemite is out and Disk App is ready! Create space for installing Yosemite or clean space post installing Yosemite!!   Clean & create gigabytes of unneeded and unwanted files on your drive in a few clicks.   Disk App optimizes the following folders: Cache App Logs Old iOS Downloads Mail Downloads Browser Data […]

title: Chocolat 3.1.1 – Native Cocoa text editor

title: Voila 3.8.1 – Capture, annotate, organize, and share media
content: Voila is a screen-capture, recording, and annotation tool that is a full-featured replacement for Mac’s screen-capture and screen-recording capabilities. It has a large and robust set of editing, organizing, annotation, and effects tools that allows the user to create and add details to screenshots, tutorials, videos, and presentations.   Voila lets you capture any shape, […]

title: SQLite Professional 1.0.40 – Advanced SQL editor
content: SQLite Professional is the top SQLite editor for OS X.    Features: Automatic data reloading when the database gets modified externally. Backwards compatibility with SQLite 2. Version integration. Mucked your database? Rollback to a previous version. Semiautomatic dependency resolution. Column reordering. Import or export your data in CSV, mySQL, XML, or JSON formats. Export custom […]

title: Peppermint 1.4 – The CoffeeScript-able Swiss Army knife for coding
content: Peppermint is the freshest, eco-friendly code editor for your Mac.   Features: 70+ different syntaxes supported 10+ different themes Lots of different plugins/tools for everything you need Instantly Run/Preview your code, in over 25 languages, without ever leaving Peppermint Included FTP/SFTP mapping support Complete Emmet support + HTML/CSS snippets & autocompletion Node.js integration Clojure integration […]

title: iSmartPhoto 1.1 – iSmartPhoto is a fast image browser and powerful image organizer
content: iSmartPhoto is a fast image browser and powerful image organizer. Work with retina displays, Compatible with Yosemite! Unlike iPhoto that require user to import photos into the software, iSmartPhoto pulls your photos from any folder or drive. By just double clicking a single image in Finder or dragging a folder, iSmartPhoto automatically display every image […]

title: YouTube Hunter 5.5.4 – Download and convert YouTube videos
content: YouTubeHunter is a video downloader and converter.   It takes only seconds to find and download videos from YouTube, Vimeo, DailyMotion, VEVO and others. YouTubeHunter downloads videos 15x faster than real time playing and supports simultaneous downloads. YouTubeHunter has built-in search and preview capabilities.
